titles: Eggcellent Task: Work out the algorithm for boiling an egg, put steps 1, 3, 5, 7, 9 and 11 in order on this screen
Eggcellent Task: Work out the algorithm for boiling an egg, put steps 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12 in order on this screen
clues: Wait for chicken to lay egg
Left hand pick up saucepan place under tap
Leave egg in saucepan for 3 days
Right hand turn tap and fill saucepan with water half full
Left hand place saucepan onto oven hob
Tight hand turn on oven hob
Bring water in saucepan to boiling temperature
Tight hand pick up spoon, pick up egg
Leave egg in saucepan for 20 minutes
Leave egg in saucepan for 3 minutes
Right hand pick up spoon, scoop egg from water
Right hand with spoon serve egg into egg cup
